title: What did most WWII Italian soldiers do after WW2 was over? - Quora

response.answer_text: Army officer Gianni Agnelli, FIAT Automobile president  Army officer and POW Alessandro Natta, head of the Italian Communist party  Alpine troop sergeant Mario Rigoni Stern, writer  Cavalry officer Amedeo Guillet, Ambassador of the Italian Republic in Morocco and India  Navy officer and frogman commando operator Luigi Durand De La Penne, Conservative MP  Army officer Carlo Azeglio Ciampi, Bank of Italy governor, Prime Minister and President of the Italian Republic
